mapper.select: select ps.STORE_ID as STORE_ID, ps.PRODUCT_ID as PRODUCT_ID,p.PRODUCT_NAME as PRODUCT_NAME, ps.STORE_NUM as STORE_NUM, ps.WAREHOUSE as WAREHOUSE, ps.ALLOCATION as ALLOCATION from t_product_store ps left join t_product p on ps.PRODUCT_ID = p.PRODUCT_ID order by ps.STORE_ID
mapper.insert: insert into t_product_store (STORE_ID, PRODUCT_ID, STORE_NUM, WAREHOUSE, ALLOCATION) values (#{storeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{productId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{storeNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{warehouse,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{allocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into t_product_store
STORE_ID,
PRODUCT_ID,
STORE_NUM,
WAREHOUSE,
ALLOCATION,
#{storeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{productId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{storeNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{warehouse,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{allocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update t_product_store
PRODUCT_ID = #{productId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
STORE_NUM = #{storeNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
WAREHOUSE = #{warehouse,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ALLOCATION = #{allocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where STORE_ID = #{storeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
